content:
PageMediaSizeName Enum

In this Article

Specifies the page size or roll width of the paper or other print media.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum PageMediaSizeName

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • PageMediaSizeName

Remarks

This enumeration is used to provide values for the PageMediaSizeName property. The PageMediaSize class, in turn, is used to provide values for the PageMediaSizeCapability property where it specifies the various page sizes a printer can use, and the PageMediaSize property, where it instructs a printer which page size to use.
